raw akas.title: Tian Zhen Yu Dao Xian Shi

akas: Tian Zhen Yu Dao Xian Shi (original title)
Ms. Innocence and Mr. Reality World-wide (English title) (complete title)
akas from release info: Tian Zhen Yu Dao Xian Shi (original title)
Ms. Innocence and Mr. Reality World-wide (English title) (complete title)
imdb.plot outline: Ms. Innocence divorces her husband after knowing he cheats on her. In order to prove that she can depend on herself, she leaves him with her daughter without asking any money from him. Then she starts to sell insurance for a living whereas life is not easy for her. By accident Ms. Innocence meets Mr. Reality. Ms. Innocence is his dream girl when Mr. Reality studies in college. As they are both divorced, Mr. Reality develops feelings for her again. Through his contact with her, he discovers that Ms. Innocence is an amazing woman. Thus, he expresses his love to her boldly. However, their plan to get married is opposed by Mr. Reality's mother and his younger sister. But they get married anyway. Gradually, Ms. Innocence wins her mother-in-law over with her sincerity and kindness. Unfortunately, Ms. Innocence has an accidental abortion, and she is told that she can no longer bear children. The sudden news is a huge disappointment to the family. As Mr. Reality's mother wants to have a grandson eagerly, Ms. Innocence asks for divorce. Cheng Min, her ex-husband, is very happy about it, as he wants to remarry her. But Mr. Reality knows she is the one and asks her to stay with his sincerity. The two lovers finally get back again.
